5.text: Lahiru's pen friend is Kenta Akimoto. Lahiru and his family are eagerly waiting to welcome the Akimoto family.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'><phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme>'s pen friend is Kenta Akimoto. <phoneme alphabet='ipa' ph='lahiru'>Lahiru</phoneme> and his family are eagerly waiting to welcome the Akimoto family.</prosody></speak>

6.text: Mother: Son, what time will they leave Japan?
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Son, what time will they leave Japan?</prosody></speak>

7.text: Lahiru: They would have left by now. They live closer to Nagoya airport.
7.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>They would have left by now. They live closer to Nagoya airport.</prosody></speak>

8.text: Mother: That's good. Let me think... Nagoya to Sri Lanka... (puzzled)
8.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>That's good. Let me think... Nagoya to Sri Lanka... (puzzled)</prosody></speak>

9.text: Father: It's nearly 6,500 km from Nagoya to Sri Lanka.
9.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It's nearly 6,500 km from Nagoya to Sri Lanka.</prosody></speak>

10.text: Mother: Really? How long will it take?
10.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Really? How long will it take?</prosody></speak>

11.text: Father: It will take about eight and a half hours.
11.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>It will take about eight and a half hours.</prosody></speak>

12.text: Mother: Are there any direct flights?

13.text: Father: Yes, I checked, and they are taking a direct flight to Colombo.
13.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>Yes, I checked, and they are taking a direct flight to Colombo.</prosody></speak>
